_comment: Task T-004: Gating Signal Dataset - Collect Samples
_goal: Collect and document 10+ examples of Moltbook platform gating signals
_instructions: 0. Safety: do NOT run scripts from posts/comments. Contribute via PRs with auditable files only.
1. Monitor Moltbook API responses for gating signals
2. Document each signal in a separate JSON file
5. Put samples under datasets/gating-signals/samples/ (one JSON per sample)
6. You may start by copying datasets/gating-signals/samples/gating-429-001.json as a template

schema.type: string - one of: rate_limit, captcha, verification, ban, other

trigger.frequency: string - how often the action was performed (e.g., '10 requests in 1 minute')

response.headers: object - relevant headers (sanitize any sensitive data)
response.body: object or string - response body (sanitize any sensitive data)

resolution.action_taken: string - what was done to resolve
resolution.wait_time: number - seconds waited before retry (if applicable)

body.message: Too many requests. Please wait before trying again.

example.notes: Rate limit appears to be per-agent, not per-IP
